entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 a.m. CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow near midnight. Blowing snow in outlying areas overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in outlying areas. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
